target_description: the tweet containers, containing user info content and metrics
reasoning: The selector 'article[data-testid="tweet"]' targets all tweet containers that encapsulate both user info and tweet metrics. This uses the semantic <article> tag (which is stable for tweet content on X/Twitter) combined with the very stable data-testid attribute specifically set to 'tweet' by Twitter/X's front-end. This approach avoids any unstable, auto-generated classes or IDs, and precisely matches all main tweet blocks—each containing user info (avatar, names, handles, etc.), body, and metrics (like/reply/retweet counts). This selector will match multiple elements (one per tweet container), making it robust and suitable for targeting all tweets in the timeline or thread context. No more specific or stable selector exists for this use case on this site.
